## Archetypes

Basically, some pre-made PEDD character builds, fitting both the typical D&D classes and some completely out there examples to show off the system (i.e., the player cards I've done so far)

[Naiveilin, the Needle & Thread](https://bellaby.co.uk/pedd/character-creator?) - a bard-like character who's passion in fashion lead them down a road of tying everything together, the group, conspiracy and clothing.

[Rascal, the Urchin Busybody](https://bellaby.co.uk/pedd/character-creator?) - another bard like character, but this one a wiley street urchin who's a dab hand with a crossbow. Shows how even similar class characters (were this 5e) can be radically different characters in PEDD.
